properties.name: Provide the token for the org
Overall Test Status For XDR1248-Duplicate System Wfs

properties.description:
1. Duplicate All System Atomics:
   - Duplicate all system atomic workflows.
2. Verify Both Workflow Validation and Status:
   - Confirm that the duplicated workflows are both validated and have a valid status.
3. Verify Created_By Field:
   - Ensure that the "created_by" field reflects a custom user email.
4. Verify Invalid_Properties:
   - Check that the "invalid_properties" field is null, indicating no validation errors.
5. Verify Workflow Permissions:
   - Confirm that the workflow permissions include ["Manage", "run"], indicating that users can edit and run the workflows.
6. Final Step: Delete All Duplicated Workflows:
   - Delete all duplicated workflows to clean up the system after verification.
